Elevate the Spirit.name: Elevate the Spirit
Elevate the Spirit.flavor: You conjure an angelic entity that infuses one of your allies’ with hope and the mental fortitude to withstand attempts at control.
Elevate the Spirit.effect: You conjure an angelic figure in a square within range. The figure lasts until the end of your next turn. While the figure is in an ally’s space, that ally gains a +4 power bonus to all defenses and can’t be dominated. If an ally is affected by a dominating effect that a save can end while the figure is in his or her space, that effect immediately ends. As a move action, you can move the figure 5 squares.
